summary: AN ORDINANCE repealing Sections 299, 299A, 300, 300-A, 300-B, 300-C, 300-E, 300-G, 300-H, 300-J, 300-K, 327, 328, 328-A, 328-B, 328-C, 328-D, 330, 330.1, 330.2, 330.3, 330.4, 330.5, 330.6 and 330.7 of the License Code (Ordinance 48022), and Ordinance 70384, 84319, 85795, and 87384, relating to the licensing and regulation of the sale, use and operation of certain amusement devices, mechanical music machines, and panoram devices.
